title: eLearning Design and Change Management Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design principles and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course designed to develop e-learning transition and organizational change management capabilities based on prior in-person education design experience. Strengthening practitioner-centered project-based learning.

learning_goals: Systematically design e-learning courses by applying research-based instructional design principles.
Establish learning transfer strategies through analysis of organizational change barriers.
Measure and improve learning outcomes using project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
